General.Name: The LEADCORP Inc
General.Description: The LEADCORP, Inc. provides consumer credit financing services. It also engages in the wholesale and retail of oil; and operation of highway rest stations in Cheonan Province, Korea. The LEADCORP, Inc. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
